verses.name: Ezekiel 27:12
verses.text: Tarshish was thy merchant by reason of the multitude of all kind of riches; with silver, iron, tin, and lead, they traded in thy fairs.

verses.name: Ezekiel 27:13
verses.text: Javan, Tubal, and Meshech, they were thy merchants: they traded the persons of men and vessels of brass in thy market.

verses.name: Ezekiel 27:14
verses.text: They of the house of Togarmah traded in thy fairs with horses and horsemen and mules.

verses.name: Ezekiel 27:15
verses.text: The men of Dedan were thy merchants; many isles were the merchandise of thine hand: they brought thee for a present horns of ivory and ebony.
